itinerary.mapNote: Remote 2-mile beach. Accessible only by trail or sea. 0m.
Return trek. Trail end at road. 0m.

waypoints.name: Hanakāpīʻai Falls
waypoints.note: 300m waterfall 2mi from trail start. Side trip. Day hikers go here.

waypoints.name: Kalalau Valley
waypoints.note: Largest valley on Nā Pali. Ancient Hawaiian agricultural terraces.

waypoints.name: Nā Pali Cliffs
waypoints.note: 3000ft green ridgelines plunging into the Pacific. No road access.

waypoints.name: Kalalau Beach
waypoints.note: Remote 2-mile beach. Freshwater stream. Goats and sea caves.

waypoints.name: Keʻe Beach (Start/End)
waypoints.note: Trailhead. Coral reef snorkelling. Road end of North Shore.
